overfit.note: HMM is unsupervised. No train/val loss ratio. MI-based HPO objective with 30 Optuna trials.

mi.note: MI increase 0.09%, far below 5% threshold. Submodel MI contributions near zero for momentum_z and vol_regime_z.

vif.note: Excellent VIF. Submodel features are nearly orthogonal to base features.

stability.note: All columns below 0.15 threshold. Stable correlation with gold returns over time.

direction.note: DA degrades -2.06%. Worst of any passing submodel. DA worsened in 4/5 folds.

sharpe.note: Sharpe degrades -0.593. Worst of any passing submodel. Sharpe worsened in 4/5 folds.

mae.note: MAE improves -0.0658 (6.6x threshold). Improved in 3/5 folds (folds 1, 4, 5).

warnings: DA degradation (-2.06%) is the worst of any MAE-passing submodel
Sharpe degradation (-0.593) is the worst of any MAE-passing submodel
CNY features may attenuate prediction magnitudes (improving MAE) while adding noise to directional signals
Monitor closely during meta-model integration; consider excluding if meta-model DA degrades

decision_rationale: Gate 3 PASS via MAE criterion (-0.0658, 6.6x threshold, 3/5 folds). Despite significant DA and Sharpe degradation, the evaluation rules specify that any single Gate 3 criterion is sufficient. This is the final submodel (9/9). Warnings issued for meta-model integration.
